name: Bonesaw: The Game
description:
A huge platformer beat em up with over dozens of levels, big boss battles, puzzles, and secrets galore.

Take control of the last remaining Golden Knight on his quest to save the rest of his hockey team from the grip of a corrupt referee.

An ultra challenging experience inspired by the games of yesteryear.

Credits

  • Game by Kyle Pulver
  • Music by Josh Whelchel
